item.description:
Event Webpage

It's almost time for BLUES CAFE again!
LINDY - SWING - BLUES - WEST COAST - MORE
Friday Oct. 19th
Beginner lesson 8-9
Live music by
Adriel Azure and his Indigo Dream Orchestra
till 12:30am
98 George P. Hassett Dr., Medford Sq. 02155
Just off Rt. 93 next to Hyatt Place
Directions at www.springstep.org

$15 regular admission
STUDENTS AND SENIORS - ONLY $8 ADMISSION

Come hang out and enjoy the beautiful atmosphere, drink free coffee and bottled water, enjoy snacks and homemade cookies while the band seranades you and dancers entertain you! Oh, and you can dance too if the spirit moves you!

I WILL HAVE A SPECIAL MEETUP TABLE SO MEETUP FOLKS CAN MEET!

No partner or experience in dancing required! This is a relaxed and friendly event with fun people, a positive vibe, and amazing music.

Davis and Liz will be teaching the beginner lesson in regular swing.

Questions? Call Liz anytime - 617-216-6656. Or email her at dancewithliz@gmail.com.
www.youwanttodance.com

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: BLUES CAFE AND DANCE
